# CS GO Analyzer <img src="app/www/img/CSGo_analyzer_sticker.PNG" align="right" width="120" />

<br>

## Overview

If you like **CS GO** and **R** probably you will enjoy this repository!

This project was developed by [Adson](https://github.com/adsoncostanzifilho) and [Rodrigo](https://github.com/Rodrigo-Fontoura), with the goal of make easy to analyze your own CS Go data in R.

You will find at this repository a couple of functions to access and extract all data available on the Steam's API related to CS GO, and also a Shiny App for you analyze your own data in a more simple way.
